document.full_text: india's prime minister began a six-day trip to africa on monday, aiming to strike deeper economic ties with a continent rich in minerals and commodities, but where asia's third-largest economy lags far behind rival china.
document.title: india pm eyes trade, catch-up with china in africa visit
lines_and_colors: india's prime minister began a six-day trip to africa on monday, aiming to strike deeper economic ties with a continent rich in minerals and commodities, but where asia's third-largest economy lags far behind rival china.
